definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The number of persons granted state allowances has been appraised every double-digital year since 2003.
sentences.chinese: 享受國家津貼的人數從2003年起逢雙年評比一次。

sentences.english: First, let's have a look at the posters.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請看手抄報評比活動的相關情況。

sentences.english: This type of television set won a silver medal in the national appraisal contest.
sentences.chinese: 這種電視機在全國評比中獲銀質獎。

sentences.english: He topped the list in this appraisal of science and research.
sentences.chinese: 這次科研評比，他高居榜首。

sentences.english: The competition of English newsletter constructs strong atmosphere of learning English.
sentences.chinese: 英語板報的評比營造了學習英語的濃濃氛圍。

sentences.english: And two obtain province quality compare and assess the first place in succession.
sentences.chinese: 並連續兩屆獲得省質量評比第一名。

sentences.english: In the provincial hospitals' periodic inspection and assessment activities.
sentences.chinese: 在全省醫院管理年活動的週期性檢查評比中。

sentences.english: For instance, majority rule works well when all rankings are ideologically driven.
sentences.chinese: 例如多數決在所有評比都受意識形態驅策時很管用。

sentences.english: ASUS ranked with a score of 416.
sentences.chinese: 華碩在這項評比中的得分是416分。
同時他們在吸引力評比方面排倒數第二。

sentences.english: Body color is an important criterion of quality and price of aquatic animals.
sentences.chinese: 體色是水生動物品質及價格的重要評比項目。

sentences.english: It was the only city that fell in the bottom half of rankings in all nine categories, " Forbes said on its website."
sentences.chinese: 它是唯一在所有九項評比中排名都靠後的城市。

definition: to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
to be chosen/to be elected as
